title: Forward Forward Algorithm
description: Code Implementation of Geoffrey Hinton's Forward-Forward Algorithm (NeurIPS, 2019). This offers an alternative approach to training neural networks. Inspired by neuroscience, steps towards neuromorphic computing.

title: Hybrid Blockchain App
description: Submission for Indian Bank's Innovision Hackathon 2025. A hybrid blockchain application that combines the benefits of both public and private blockchains. Utilizes Hyperledger Fabric for transactions and Ethereum for decentralization.

title: Spoofing Research
description: Part of an 85-credit dual degree thesis project in financial market microstructure. The goal is to study and detect spoofing behavior in financial markets through various sophisticated agent designs, exchange modifications and controlled experimentations.

title: Wikipedia Universe
description: Explore the graph-like structure representing the relationships between Wikipedia articles. The application updates in real time as it crawls through new links. It also stores the article titles in a text file for later reference.
